36template<typename weight_t>
37DiscreteStencilWeightPool<weight_t>::DiscreteStencilWeightPool(std::size_t capacity)
38 : m_capacity(capacity)
39{
40}
41
49template<typename weight_t>
50std::size_t DiscreteStencilWeightPool<weight_t>::size() const
51{
52 return m_storage.size();
53}
54
63template<typename weight_t>
64std::size_t DiscreteStencilWeightPool<weight_t>::capacity() const
65{
66 return m_capacity;
67}
68
79template<typename weight_t>
80void DiscreteStencilWeightPool<weight_t>::clear(bool release)
81{
82 m_storage.clear();
83 if (release) {
84 m_storage.shrink_to_fit();
85 }
86}
87
95template<typename weight_t>
96weight_t DiscreteStencilWeightPool<weight_t>::retrieve()
97{
98 if (size() == 0) {
99 throw std::runtime_error("Unable to retrieve a weight from the pool: the pool is empty.");
100 }
101
102 weight_t weight = std::move(m_storage.back());
103 m_storage.pop_back();
104
105 return weight;
106}
107
113template<typename weight_t>
114void DiscreteStencilWeightPool<weight_t>::store(weight_t &&weight)
115{
116 if (m_capacity == size()) {
117 return;
118 }
119
120 m_storage.emplace_back(std::move(weight));
121}
122
128template<typename weight_t>
129void DiscreteStencilWeightPool<weight_t>::store(std::vector<weight_t> *weights)
130{
131 std::size_t nStorableWeights = std::min(m_capacity - size(), weights->size());
132 if (nStorableWeights == 0) {
133 return;
134 }
135
136 m_storage.insert(m_storage.end(),
137 std::make_move_iterator(weights->begin()),
138 std::make_move_iterator(weights->begin() + nStorableWeights));
139}
140
148template<typename weight_t>
149OBinaryStream& operator<<(OBinaryStream &buffer, const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil)
150{
151 buffer << stencil.m_zero;
152
153 std::size_t nItems = stencil.size();
154 buffer << nItems;
155
156 const long *patternData = stencil.patternData();
157 const weight_t *weightData = stencil.weightData();
158 for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
159 buffer << patternData[n];
160 buffer << weightData[n];
161 }
162
163 buffer << stencil.m_constant;
164
165 return buffer;
166}
167
175template<typename weight_t>
176IBinaryStream& operator>>(IBinaryStream &buffer, DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &stencil)
177{
178 buffer >> stencil.m_zero;
179
180 std::size_t nItems;
181 buffer >> nItems;
182
183 stencil.resize(nItems);
184 long *patternData = stencil.patternData();
185 weight_t *weightData = stencil.weightData();
186 for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
187 buffer >> patternData[n];
188 buffer >> weightData[n];
189 }
190
191 buffer >> stencil.m_constant;
192
193 return buffer;
194}
195
201template<typename weight_t>
202DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::DiscreteStencil(const weight_t &zero)
203 : DiscreteStencil(0, zero)
204{
205}
206
213template<typename weight_t>
214DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::DiscreteStencil(std::size_t size, const weight_t &zero)
215 : m_zero(zero),
216 m_pattern(size, -1), m_weights(size, m_zero),
217 m_constant(m_zero)
218{
219}
220
228template<typename weight_t>
229DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::DiscreteStencil(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t &zero)
230 : m_zero(zero),
231 m_pattern(pattern, pattern + size), m_weights(size, m_zero),
232 m_constant(m_zero)
233{
234}
235
244template<typename weight_t>
245DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::DiscreteStencil(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t *weights, const weight_t &zero)
246 : m_zero(zero),
247 m_pattern(pattern, pattern + size), m_weights(weights, weights + size),
248 m_constant(m_zero)
249{
250}
251
258template<typename weight_t>
259void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::initialize(std::size_t size, const weight_t &zero)
260{
261 rawCopyValue(zero, &m_zero);
262
263 std::size_t previousSize = this->size();
264 std::size_t commonSize = std::min(previousSize, size);
265 for (std::size_t n = 0; n < commonSize; ++n) {
266 m_pattern[n] = -1;
267 rawCopyValue(m_zero, m_weights.data() + n);
268 }
269 if (previousSize != size) {
270 resize(size);
271 }
272
273 zeroConstant();
274}
275
283template<typename weight_t>
284void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::initialize(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t &zero)
285{
286 rawCopyValue(zero, &m_zero);
287
288 std::size_t previousSize = this->size();
289 std::size_t commonSize = std::min(previousSize, size);
290 for (std::size_t n = 0; n < commonSize; ++n) {
291 m_pattern[n] = pattern[n];
292 rawCopyValue(m_zero, m_weights.data() + n);
293 }
294 if (previousSize != size) {
295 resize(size);
296 for (std::size_t n = previousSize; n < size; ++n) {
297 m_pattern[n] = pattern[n];
298 }
299 }
300
301 zeroConstant();
302}
303
312template<typename weight_t>
313void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::initialize(std::size_t size, const long *pattern, const weight_t *weights, const weight_t &zero)
314{
315 rawCopyValue(zero, &m_zero);
316
317 std::size_t previousSize = this->size();
318 std::size_t commonSize = std::min(previousSize, size);
319 for (std::size_t n = 0; n < commonSize; ++n) {
320 m_pattern[n] = pattern[n];
321 rawCopyValue(weights[n], m_weights.data() + n);
322 }
323 if (size > previousSize) {
324 reserve(size);
325 for (std::size_t n = previousSize; n < size; ++n) {
326 appendItem(pattern[n], weights[n]);
327 }
328 } else if (size < previousSize) {
329 resize(size);
330 }
331
332 zeroConstant();
333}
334
341template<typename weight_t>
342void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::initialize(const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &other)
343{
344 initialize(other.size(), other.m_pattern.data(), other.m_weights.data(), other.m_zero);
345}
346
352template<typename weight_t>
353std::size_t DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::size() const
354{
355 return m_pattern.size();
356}
357
363template<typename weight_t>
364void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::resize(std::size_t size)
365{
366 m_pattern.resize(size, -1);
367 m_weights.resize(size, m_zero);
368}
369
378template<typename weight_t>
379void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::reserve(std::size_t capacity)
380{
381 m_pattern.reserve(capacity);
382 m_weights.reserve(capacity);
383}

394 return m_pattern[pos];

465 return m_weights[pos];

499 m_weights[pos] = weight;

508template<typename weight_t>
509void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::setWeight(std::size_t pos, weight_t &&weight)
510{
511 m_weights[pos] = std::move(weight);

521template<typename weight_t>
522void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::sumWeight(std::size_t pos, const weight_t &value, double factor)
523{
524 rawSumValue(value, factor, m_weights.data() + pos);
525}
526
532template<typename weight_t>
533void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::zeroWeight(std::size_t pos)
534{
535 rawCopyValue(m_zero, m_weights.data() + pos);
536}
537
545template<typename weight_t>
546void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::setItem(std::size_t pos, long id, const weight_t &weight)
547{
548 setPattern(pos, id);
549 setWeight(pos, weight);
550}
551
559template<typename weight_t>
560void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::setItem(std::size_t pos, long id, weight_t &&weight)
561{
562 setPattern(pos, id);
563 setWeight(pos, std::move(weight));
564}
565
576template<typename weight_t>
577void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::sumItem(long id, const weight_t &value, double factor)
578{
579 weight_t *weight = findWeight(id);
580 if (weight) {
581 rawSumValue(value, factor, weight);
582 } else {
583 appendItem(id, value);
584 if (factor != 1.) {
585 m_weights.back() *= factor;
586 }
587 }
588}
589
599template<typename weight_t>
600void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::appendItem(long id, const weight_t &weight)
601{
602 m_pattern.push_back(id);
603 appendWeight(weight);
604}
605
615template<typename weight_t>
616void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::appendItem(long id, weight_t &&weight)
617{
618 m_pattern.push_back(id);
619 appendWeight(std::move(weight));
620}

627template<typename weight_t>
628const weight_t & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::getConstant() const
629{
630 return m_constant;
631}
632
638template<typename weight_t>
639weight_t & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::getConstant()
640{
641 return m_constant;
642}
643
649template<typename weight_t>
650void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::setConstant(const weight_t &value)
651{
652 rawCopyValue(value, &m_constant);
653}
654
660template<typename weight_t>
661void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::setConstant(weight_t &&value)
662{
663 rawMoveValue(std::move(value), &m_constant);
664}
665
672template<typename weight_t>
673void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::sumConstant(const weight_t &value, double factor)
674{
675 rawSumValue(value, factor, &m_constant);
676}
677
681template<typename weight_t>
682void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::zeroConstant()
683{
684 rawCopyValue(m_zero, &m_constant);
685}
686
697template<typename weight_t>
698void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::clear(bool release)
699{
700 m_pattern.clear();
701 if (release) {
702 m_pattern.shrink_to_fit();
703 }
704
705 clearWeights(release);
706
707 zeroConstant();
708}
709
716template<typename weight_t>
717void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::sum(const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &other, double factor)
718{
719 const std::size_t other_nItems = other.size();
720 for (std::size_t n = 0; n < other_nItems; ++n) {
721 sumItem(other.m_pattern[n], other.m_weights[n], factor);
722 }
723
724 sumConstant(other.m_constant, factor);
725}
726
732template<typename weight_t>
733void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::optimize(double tolerance)
734{
735 std::size_t nItems = size();
736 for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
737 if (isWeightNegligible(m_weights[n], tolerance)) {
738 m_pattern.erase(m_pattern.begin() + n);
739 m_weights.erase(m_weights.begin() + n);
740 --n;
741 --nItems;
742 }
743 }
744}
745
751template<typename weight_t>
752void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::renumber(const std::unordered_map<long, long> &map)
753{
754 renumber([&map] (long id) -> long { return map.at(id); });
755}
756
763template<typename weight_t>
764template<typename Mapper>
765void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::renumber(const Mapper &map)
766{
767 for (long &id : m_pattern) {
768 id = map(id);
769 }
770}
771
777template<typename weight_t>
778void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::addComplementToZero(long id)
779{
780 const std::size_t nItems = size();
781 if (nItems == 0) {
782 return;
783 }
784
785 weight_t complement = m_zero;
786 for (const weight_t &weight : m_weights) {
787 rawSumValue(weight, -1., &complement);
788 }
789
790 appendItem(id, complement);
791}
792
796template<typename weight_t>
797void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::zero()
798{
799 for (weight_t &weight : m_weights) {
800 rawCopyValue(m_zero, &weight);
801 }
802
803 setConstant(m_zero);
804}
805
813template<typename weight_t>
814template<typename W>
815bool DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::isWeightNegligible(const W &weight, double tolerance) const
816{
817 return (std::abs(weight - m_zero) <= tolerance);
818}
819
827template<typename weight_t>
828template<typename W, typename V, long unsigned int D, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<std::array<V, D>, W>::value>::type *>
829bool DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::isWeightNegligible(const std::array<V, D> &weight, double tolerance) const
830{
831 for (long unsigned int k = 0; k < D; ++k) {
832 if (std::abs(weight[k] - m_zero[k]) > tolerance) {
833 return false;
834 }
835 }
836
837 return true;
838}
839
847template<typename weight_t>
848template<typename W, typename V, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<std::vector<V>, W>::value>::type *>
849bool DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::isWeightNegligible(const std::vector<V> &weight, double tolerance) const
850{
851 const int nItems = weight.size();
852 for (int k = 0; k < nItems; ++k) {
853 if (std::abs(weight[k] - m_zero[k]) > tolerance) {
854 return false;
855 }
856 }
857
858 return true;
859}
860
868template<typename weight_t>
869weight_t * DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::findWeight(long id)
870{
871 auto patternBegin = m_pattern.cbegin();
872 auto patternEnd = m_pattern.cend();
873 for (auto itr = patternBegin; itr != patternEnd; ++itr) {
874 if (*itr == id) {
875 return (m_weights.data() + std::distance(patternBegin, itr));
876 }
877 }
878
879 return nullptr;
880}
881
889template<typename weight_t>
890const weight_t * DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::findWeight(long id) const
891{
892 auto patternBegin = m_pattern.cbegin();
893 auto patternEnd = m_pattern.cend();
894 for (auto itr = patternBegin; itr != patternEnd; ++itr) {
895 if (*itr == id) {
896 return (m_weights.data() + std::distance(patternBegin, itr));
897 }
898 }
899
900 return nullptr;
901}

908template<typename weight_t>
909void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::appendWeight(weight_t &&weight)
910{
911 m_weights.push_back(std::move(weight));
912}
913
919template<typename weight_t>
920void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::appendWeight(const weight_t &weight)
921{
922 m_weights.push_back(weight);
923}

935template<typename weight_t>
936void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::clearWeights(bool release)
937{
938 m_weights.clear();
939 if (release) {
940 m_weights.shrink_to_fit();
941 }
942}

951template<typename weight_t>
952template<typename W>
953void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::rawSumValue(const W &value, double factor, W *target)
954{
955 *target += factor * value;
956}
957
965template<typename weight_t>
966template<typename W, typename V, long unsigned int D, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<std::array<V, D>, W>::value>::type *>
967void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::rawSumValue(const std::array<V, D> &value, double factor, std::array<V, D> *target)
968{
969 for (long unsigned int i = 0; i < D; ++i) {
970 (*target)[i] += factor * value[i];
971 }
972}
973
985template<typename weight_t>
986template<typename W, typename V, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<std::vector<V>, W>::value>::type *>
987void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::rawSumValue(const std::vector<V> &value, double factor, std::vector<V> *target)
988{
989 std::size_t valueSize = value.size();
990 std::size_t targetSize = target->size();
991 std::size_t commonSize = std::min(valueSize, targetSize);
992
993 for (std::size_t i = 0; i < commonSize; ++i) {
994 (*target)[i] += factor * value[i];
995 }
996
997 if (valueSize > targetSize) {
998 target->insert(target->end(), value.cbegin() + commonSize, value.cend());
999
1000 if (factor != 1.) {
1001 auto targetBegin = target->begin();
1002 auto targetEnd = target->end();
1003 for (auto itr = targetBegin + commonSize; itr != targetEnd; ++itr) {
1004 *itr *= factor;
1005 }
1006 }
1007 }
1008}
1009
1016template<typename weight_t>
1017template<typename W>
1018void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::rawCopyValue(const W &source, W *target)
1019{
1020 *target = source;
1021}
1022
1029template<typename weight_t>
1030template<typename W, typename V, long unsigned int D, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<std::array<V, D>, W>::value>::type *>
1031void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::rawCopyValue(const std::array<V, D> &source, std::array<V, D> *target)
1032{
1033 std::copy_n(source.data(), D, target->data());
1034}
1035
1044template<typename weight_t>
1045template<typename W, typename V, typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<std::vector<V>, W>::value>::type *>
1046void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::rawCopyValue(const std::vector<V> &source, std::vector<V> *target)
1047{
1048 std::size_t sourceSize = source.size();
1049 std::size_t targetSize = target->size();
1050 std::size_t commonSize = std::min(sourceSize, targetSize);
1051
1052 std::copy_n(source.data(), commonSize, target->data());
1053
1054 if (sourceSize < targetSize) {
1055 target->resize(sourceSize);
1056 } else if (sourceSize > targetSize) {
1057 target->insert(target->end(), source.begin() + commonSize, source.end());
1058 }
1059}
1066template<typename weight_t>
1067template<typename W>
1068void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::rawMoveValue(W &&source, W *target)
1069{
1070 *target = std::move(source);
1071}
1072
1079template<typename weight_t>
1080void DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::display(std::ostream &out, double factor) const
1081{
1082 const std::size_t nItems = size();
1083
1084 weight_t sum = m_zero;
1085 for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
1086 long id = m_pattern[n];
1087 weight_t value = factor * m_weights[n];
1088 out << " id: " << id << " weight: " << value << std::endl;
1089 rawSumValue(value, 1., &sum);
1090 }
1091
1092 out << " constant : " << (factor * m_constant) << std::endl;
1093 out << " sum : " << sum << std::endl;
1094}
1095
1101template<typename weight_t>
1102size_t DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::getBinarySize() const
1103{
1104 std::size_t nItems = size();
1105
1106 return (sizeof(m_zero) + nItems * (sizeof(long) + sizeof(weight_t)) + sizeof(m_constant));
1107}
1108
1120template<typename weight_t>
1121weight_t & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::at(long id)
1122{
1123 return const_cast<weight_t &>(static_cast<const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &>(*this).at(id));
1124}
1125
1137template<typename weight_t>
1138const weight_t & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::at(long id) const
1139{
1140 const weight_t *weight = findWeight(id);
1141 if (weight) {
1142 return *weight;
1143 }
1144
1145 throw("The stencil doens't contain an item with the specified id");
1146}
1147
1159template<typename weight_t>
1160weight_t & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::operator[](long id)
1161{
1162 weight_t *weight = findWeight(id);
1163 if (weight) {
1164 return *weight;
1165 }
1166
1167 appendItem(id, m_zero);
1168
1169 return m_weights.back();
1170}
1171
1178template<typename weight_t>
1179DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::operator*=(double factor)
1180{
1181 for (weight_t &weight : m_weights) {
1182 weight *= factor;
1183 }
1184 m_constant *= factor;
1185
1186 return *this;
1187}
1188
1195template<typename weight_t>
1196DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::operator/=(double factor)
1197{
1198 for (weight_t &weight : m_weights) {
1199 weight /= factor;
1200 }
1201 m_constant /= factor;
1202
1203 return *this;
1204}
1205
1212template<typename weight_t>
1213DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::operator+=(const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &other)
1214{
1215 sum(other, 1.);
1216
1217 return *this;
1218}
1219
1226template<typename weight_t>
1227DiscreteStencil<weight_t> & DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::operator-=(const DiscreteStencil<weight_t> &other)
1228{
1229 sum(other, - 1.);
1230
1231 return *this;
1232}

1239template<typename weight_t>
1240MPDiscreteStencil<weight_t>::MPDiscreteStencil(const weight_t &zero)
1241 : DiscreteStencil<weight_t>(zero),
1242 m_weightPool(nullptr)
1243{
1244}
1245
1252template<typename weight_t>
1253MPDiscreteStencil<weight_t>::MPDiscreteStencil(std::size_t size, const weight_t &zero)
1254 : DiscreteStencil<weight_t>(size, zero),

1305template<typename weight_t>
1306void MPDiscreteStencil<weight_t>::appendWeight(const weight_t &weight)
1307{
1308 if (m_weightPool && m_weightPool->size() > 0) {
1309 this->m_weights.emplace_back(m_weightPool->retrieve());
1310 this->m_weights.back() = weight;
1311 } else {
1312 DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::appendWeight(weight);
1313 }
1314}
1315
1326template<typename weight_t>
1327void MPDiscreteStencil<weight_t>::clearWeights(bool release)
1328{
1329 if (m_weightPool) {
1330 m_weightPool->store(&(this->m_weights));
1331 }
1332
1333 DiscreteStencil<weight_t>::clearWeights(release);
1334}
1335
1336}

1347{

1422template <typename V>
1423typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> operator*(const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<V> &stencil, const std::array<V, 3> &vector)
1424{
1425 return (vector * stencil);
1426}
1427
1435template <typename V>
1436typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> operator*(const std::array<V, 3> &vector, const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<V> &stencil)
1437{
1438 const std::size_t nItems = stencil.size();
1439 bitpit::StencilVector stencil_B;
1440 stencil_B.resize(nItems);
1441 for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
1442 stencil_B.setPattern(n, stencil.getPattern(n));
1443 stencil_B.setWeight(n, ::operator*(stencil.getWeight(n), vector));
1444 }
1445 stencil_B.setConstant(::operator*(stencil.getConstant(), vector));
1446
1447 return stencil_B;
1448}
1449
1457template <typename V>
1458typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<V> dotProduct(const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> &stencil, const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>>::weight_type &vector)
1459{
1460 typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<V> stencil_dotProduct;
1461 dotProduct(stencil, vector, &stencil_dotProduct);
1462
1463 return stencil_dotProduct;
1464}
1465
1473template <typename V>
1474void dotProduct(const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> &stencil, const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>>::weight_type &vector, typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<V> *stencil_dotProduct)
1475{
1476 const std::size_t nItems = stencil.size();
1477 stencil_dotProduct->resize(nItems);
1478
1479 const long *patternData = stencil.patternData();
1480 const bitpit::StencilVector::weight_type *weightData = stencil.weightData();
1481 long *patternData_dotProduct = stencil_dotProduct->patternData();
1482 bitpit::StencilScalar::weight_type *weightData_dotProduct = stencil_dotProduct->weightData();
1483 for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
1484 patternData_dotProduct[n] = patternData[n];
1485 weightData_dotProduct[n] = ::dotProduct(weightData[n], vector);
1486 }
1487
1488 stencil_dotProduct->setConstant(::dotProduct(stencil.getConstant(), vector));
1489}
1490
1498template <typename V>
1499typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> project(const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> &stencil, const std::array<V, 3> &direction)
1500{
1501 typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> stencil_projection;
1502 project(stencil, direction, &stencil_projection);
1503
1504 return stencil_projection;
1505}
1506
1514template <typename V>
1515void project(const typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> &stencil, const std::array<V, 3> &direction, typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>> *stencil_projection)
1516{
1517 stencil_projection->initialize(stencil);
1518 const std::size_t nItems = stencil_projection->size();
1519
1520 typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>>::weight_type *weightData_projection = stencil_projection->weightData();
1521 for (std::size_t n = 0; n < nItems; ++n) {
1522 typename bitpit::DiscreteStencil<std::array<V, 3>>::weight_type &weight = weightData_projection[n];
1523 weight = ::dotProduct(weight, direction) * direction;
1524 }
1525
1526 stencil_projection->setConstant(::dotProduct(stencil_projection->getConstant(), direction) * direction);
1527}
